File List

Here is a list of all files with brief descriptions:
callbacks.hSubstance callbacks signatures and related defines
context.hSubstance engine context structure and related functions definitions
datadesc.hSubstance cooked data description structure
definesorca.hORCA Platform specific public definitions
device.hPlatform specific API device structure
errors.hSubstance error codes definitions. Returned by all Substance functions
handle.hSubstance engine handle structure and related functions definitions
hardresources.hSubstance hardware resource dispatching requirements and hints
inputdesc.hSubstance input description structure
outputdesc.hSubstance output description and current state structure
pixelformat.hSubstance pixel formats definitions. Use by texture outputs
platformdep.hPlatform specific definitions
substance.hHeader for the Substance engine API. Manages the texture generation process
texture.hPlatform specific texture (results) structure
textureinput.hTexture used as input, contains platform specific texture info
version.hSubstance current version description structure and accessor function
